verb.definition: Build or erect (something, typically a building, road, or machine).
verb.example: The company was hired to construct a new bridge.

verb.definition: Form (an idea or theory) by bringing together various conceptual elements.
verb.example: He constructed a theory about the origin of the universe.

noun.definition: An idea or theory containing various conceptual elements.
noun.example: Gender is often described as a social construct.

usage_examples: They constructed a shelter out of branches.
